amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Office of Management and Budget by $9 million and to increase funding for necessary expenses of the Office of National Drug Control Policy's High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 315 - 103 (Roll no. 343).
